mapper.select: SELECT id_article, id_category, cip_user, id_status, title, description, creation_date, price, wear, nego, location FROM articles WHERE id_article = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles (id_category, cip_user, id_status, sale_title, sale_description, sale_date, sale_price, sale_wear, sale_nego, sale_location) VALUES (#{sale.id_category}, #{article.cip_user}, #{article.id_status}, #{article.title}, #{article.description}, #{article.creation_date}, #{article.price}, #{article.wear}, #{article.nego}, #{article.location});
